contributor.organization: The Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation

criterion.comment: Microsoft Office 2016 is installed on the system

metadata.title: Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability â€“ CVE-2016-7277 (MS16-148)
metadata.description: Microsoft Office 2016 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted document, aka "Microsoft Office Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

criterion.comment: Check if Mso.dll version is less than 16.0.4471.1000

metadata.title: Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.292 and 14.x through 18.x before 18.0.0.160 - CVE-2015-3104
metadata.description: Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.292 and 14.x through 18.x before 18.0.0.160 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.466 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 18.0.0.144 on Windows and before 18.0.0.143 on OS X and Android, Adobe AIR SDK before 18.0.0.144 on Windows and before 18.0.0.143 on OS X, and Adobe AIR SDK and Compiler before 18.0.0.144 on Windows and before 18.0.0.143 on OS X allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

criteria.comment: Check for installation of vulnerable Adobe Flash Player/Adobe AIR + vulnerable file version
Adobe Flash Player is installed + version (ESR)

metadata.title: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.268 and 19.x and 20.x before 20.0.0.228 - CVE-2015-8446
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.268 and 19.x and 20.x before 20.0.0.228 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.554 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 20.0.0.204, Adobe AIR SDK before 20.0.0.204, and Adobe AIR SDK and Compiler before 20.0.0.204 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via an MP3 file with COMM tags that are mishandled during memory allocation, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-8438.

criteria.comment: Check for installation of vulnerable Adobe Flash Player/Adobe AIR + vulnerable file version

metadata.title: Adobe Flash Player is installed
metadata.description: Adobe Flash Player is installed on the system

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:7116 - Changed to match Flash Player ActiveX as well as the Plugin
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:ste:5642 - Updated definition to match for 9.0.289.0 and 10.x before 10.1.192.64.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:7116 - Adobe Flash Player vulnerabilities 2013
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:tst:10714 - must check for installed Flash Player using the object oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:7290
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:6700 - The test that checks the version of Flash.*.ocx file has been added in all Adobe Flash Player vulnerabilities

criterion.comment: Adobe Flash Player is installed on the system

metadata.title: Adobe AIR is installed
metadata.description: Adobe AIR is installed on the system

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:7479 - Modifications vary from minor OVAL title/description changes to suggesting an alternative CPE name to use.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:7370 - Adobe Flash Player vulnerabilities 2013
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:24012 - the attached files contain vulnerability for Adobe Flash Player (CVE-2013-3343)

criterion.comment: Adobe AIR is installed on the system

modified.comment: Added anchor to pattern match in ste:11937

EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:tst:41561 - The attached file replaces existing Chrome objects with new objects containing the set of the existing object, which is correct for individual installs, and the registry key used by the all users installer.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - Adding 18 new definitions for recent chrome CVEs.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15382 - Make registry key checking faster.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15822 - Added windows_view behavior to Google Chrome on 64-bit Windows objects.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:15382 - Updated Google Chrome Inventory
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - definitions for the CVEs addressed by version 29.0.1547.57 of Chrome on Windows
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - New Vulnerability Definitions for Chrome addressed by versions 31.0.1650.57 and 31.0.1650.63.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:11914 - new vulnerabilities of Google Chrome

criterion.comment: Check if Google Chrome is installed
